text: BBC National Orchestra of Wales is a Welsh symphony orchestra and one of the BBC's five professional radio orchestras. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Sir Lennox Berkeley: Piano Concerto; Four Poems of St. Teresa of √Åvila; Michael Berkeley; Gethsemane Fragment; Triste (2005) * Trumpet Renaissance (2009) * Parry: Symphony No. 4; Three Movements from Suite moderne; Proserpine (2018) ==References== Category:1928 establishments Category:Orchestras
